dcterms:description: A public dataset from the ImageCLEF 2019 Med-VQA Challenge. It includes three categories of medical question-answer pairs used for classifying surgical images.
dcterms:title: Med-VQA

dcterms:description: A novel dataset generated from video sequences of robotic nephrectomy procedures, containing question-answer pairs for tool-tissue interaction detection tasks.
dcterms:title: EndoVis-18-VQA

dcterms:description: A dataset generated from video sequences of the Cholec80 dataset, containing question-answer pairs based on tool-operation and phase annotations.
dcterms:title: Cholec80-VQA
